SEARCH
Package entity

Class CompanyRepresentative

java.lang.Object
entity.User
entity.CompanyRepresentative
public class CompanyRepresentative extends User
Company Representative entity class representing users from companies. Represents a company representative who can create and manage internship opportunities.

Key capabilities and restrictions:

  • Must register with company details (initially empty list at system start)
  • User ID is the company email address
  • Can only login after approval by Career Center Staff
  • Can create up to 5 internship opportunities for their company
  • Can approve or reject student applications to their internships
  • Can toggle visibility of internship opportunities on/off
  • Can view application details and student details for their internships

  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRepresentative

      public CompanyRepresentative(String userID, String name, String password, String companyName, String department, String position)
      Constructs a new Company Representative with company and position details Representative requires approval from Career Center Staff before being able to login Initially starts with no created internships and unapproved status
      Parameters:
      userID - company email address (serves as unique identifier)
      name - representative's full name
      password - password for authentication (default: "password")
      companyName - name of the company the representative works for
      department - department within the company
      position - position/title of the representative

    • addCreatedInternship

      public boolean addCreatedInternship(String internshipID)
      Adds a newly created internship to the representative's list Maximum of 5 internships can be created per representative as per system requirements
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the ID of the internship to add
      Returns:
      true if added successfully, false if limit reached or already exists

    • removeCreatedInternship

      public boolean removeCreatedInternship(String internshipID)
      Removes an internship from the representative's created list
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the ID of the internship to remove
      Returns:
      true if removed successfully, false if not found

    • canCreateMore

      public boolean canCreateMore()
      Checks if the representative can create more internship opportunities Representatives are limited to 5 internships as per system requirements
      Returns:
      true if fewer than 5 internships have been created, false otherwise
